title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Restaurants
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants         Folks enjoy a picnic lunch. NPS photo  We invite you to enjoy a lunch in the park while visiting Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.  There are no commercial establishments (restaurants, grocery stores, motels, etc.) within the lakeshore fee boundary, but these services are available in the nearby communities.  Please check with these organizations for more information.  Alger County Chamber of Commerce P.O. Box 405, 129 E. Munising Ave. Munising, MI 49862 (906) 387-2138 www.algercounty.org  Grand Marais Chamber of Commerce P.O. Box 139 Grand Marais, MI 49839 (906) 494-2447 www.grandmaraismichigan.com  Munising Visitors Bureau P.O. Box 421 Munising, MI 49862 www.munising.org  Upper Peninsula Travel and Recreation Association P.O. Box 400 Iron Mountain,MI 49801 (906) 774-5480 www.uptravel.com
